case.read: Faitau uma mata'itusi vaega fa'amaoti ile matafaioi
case.write: Tusi uma mata'itusi ma'oti fanua fa'apitoa ile matafaioi

convos.read_all: Va'ai le tulaga o lo'o iai nei.
convos.moderate_others: Amata fa'atasi, fa'ai'u fa'atasi, ma aveese le sui auai.

events.manage_own: Fausia, fa'afou ma tape oe lava mea na tupu.
events.moderate_others: Fa'afou ma tape le mea na tupu a isi.

posts.manage_own: Fausia, fa'afou ma tape oe lava pou.
posts.moderate_others: Fa'afou ma tape le pou a isi.

forms.manage_own: Fausia, fa'afou ma tape oe lava fomu.
forms.moderate_others: Fa'afou ma tape le fomu a isi.

invoices.manage_own: Fausia, fa'afou ma tape oe lava pili.
invoices.moderate_others: Fa'afou ma tape le pili a isi.

notes.manage_own: Fausia, fa'afou ma tape oe lava fa'amatalaga.
notes.moderate_others: Fa'afou ma tape le fa'amatalaga a isi.

signs.manage_own: Fausia, fa'afou ma tape oe lava e-faailoga.
signs.moderate_others: Fa'afou ma tape le fa'ailoga fa'a-eletise a isi.

tasks.manage_own: Fausia, fa'afou ma tape oe lava galuega.
tasks.moderate_others: Fa'afou ma tape le galuega a isi.
tasks.submit_own: Tuuina atu le talosaga mo galuega.
